channel.title: golang on Silent 代码搬运工
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Silent 代码搬运工

item.title: Go 打乱数据排序
item.description: 1// func shuffle[T any](slice []T) { // go1.18 及以上 2func shuffle(slice []int64) { 3 if len(slice) == 1 { 4 return 5 } 6 r := rand.New(rand.NewSource(time.Now().UnixNano())) 7 for len(slice) > 0 { 8 n := len(slice) 9 randIndex := r.Intn(n) 10 slice[n-1], slice[randIndex] = slice[randIndex], slice[n-1] 11 slice = slice[:n-1] 12 } 13}

item.title: Golang 环境搭建
item.description: 遇到 go install 报错：.... dial tcp 172.217.160.113:443: i/o timeout 解决，终端执行：go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn 待续…

item.title: golang air 热更新使用
item.description: 首先安装 air 运行命令：go install github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest 项目根目录创建 air 配置文件：.air.conf mac 系统文件内容 1# .air.conf 文件内容 2root = "." 3tmp_dir = "tmp" 4 5[build] 6# Just plain old shell command. You could use `make` as well. 7cmd = "go build -o ./tmp/main ./web/main.go" 8# Binary file yields from `cmd`. 9bin = "tmp/main" 10# Customize binary. 11full_bin = "APP_ENV=dev APP_USER=air ./tmp/main" 12# Watch these filename extensions. 13include_ext = ["go", "tpl", "tmpl", "html"] 14# Ignore these filename extensions or directories.
